scripts.build: BR=${CF_PAGES_BRANCH:-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo unknown)}; if [ "$BR" = "main" ] || [ "$COMING_SOON" = "1" ]; then echo "Building coming soon variant (branch=$BR)"; parcel build project-root/index.html --dist-dir public --public-url ./ && cp project-root/coming-soon.html public/index.html && cp project-root/images/coming-soon-bg.jpg public/coming-soon-bg.jpg; else echo "Building full site variant (branch=$BR)"; parcel build project-root/index.html --dist-dir public --public-url ./; fi
scripts.enable-coming-soon: echo 'Coming soon is controlled by CF_PAGES_BRANCH or COMING_SOON=1 env var.'
scripts.disable-coming-soon: echo 'Use develop branch (or unset COMING_SOON) for full site builds.'
scripts.preview: npm run build && python3 -m http.server --directory public 8000
